belongs_to_collection.name: Creature From The Black Lagoon Collection

overview: A scientific expedition searching for fossils along the Amazon River discover a prehistoric Gill-Man in the legendary Black Lagoon. The explorers capture the mysterious creature, but it breaks free. The Gill-Man returns to kidnap the lovely Kay, fianc√©e of one of the expedition, with whom it has fallen in love.
tagline: From the Amazon's forbidden depths came the Creature from the Black Lagoon
title: Creature from the Black Lagoon
